snippet: Zinetula Bilyaletdinov, the coach of the Russian national team, is leaving his job after the team’s disappointing exit in the quarterfinals at the Sochi Olympics.
abstract: Zinetula Bilyaletdinov, coach of the Russian national hockey team, is leaving his job after the team’s disappointing exit in the quarterfinals at the Sochi Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Zinetula Bilyaletdinov, the coach of the Russian national team, is leaving his job after the team’s disappointing exit in the quarterfinals at the Sochi Olympics.
